DOC.detailed_description: Ankle sprain one common problem clinical practice , mostly due loss mobility . Factors affect mobility joint may due muscle tension , ligamentous anatomical anomaly . Research last year report scarce trial investigate chiropractic treatment ankle joint . Previous study focus investigate ROM proprioception . This study aim determine whether single high-velocity , low-amplitude ( HVLA ) thrust manipulation talo-crural joint alter ankle function subject dysfunction talo-crural joint .
DOC.criteria: First league handball player Talocrural joint dysfunction Age > 16 yr Patients history recent trauma previous operation remain fixation material foot ankle
